structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Erroneous Levy On Member Of Corporation; Subsequent Proceedings
law.text: If an execution against a corporation is satisfied in whole or in part by service or levy on the person or property of a member thereof, and the property levied on or damages for the service or levy are subsequently recovered by such member from the officer or judgment creditor, the creditor, upon a motion to the court which rendered the judgment, shall be entitled to a new execution for the amount then remaining due him.
